name: DDCC Prototype
description:
Use your wits and magic to defend yourself from waves of enemies. Purchase powerful spells and draw their runes to cast them and unleash their full potential. Will you be able to survive the onslaught and emerge victorious?

HOW TO PLAY:

Buy spells from the shop. Then draw the rune of the spells you bought to cast them. Do not let the enemies reach the center of the screen. 

CONTROLS: 

Mouse

Thank you for playing! 

If you enjoyed the game and want to see more of it, feel free to join our discord server, where we share infos about the development process!

https://discord.gg/2NdCJcuF
